publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4144 Peter Peacock: The Draft Joint Inspections (Scotland) Regulations 2006—That the Education Committee recommends that the draft Joint Inspections (Scotland) Regulations 2006 be approved. Supported by: Robert Brown*

S2M-4144 Peter Peacock: The Draft Joint Inspections (Scotland) Regulations 2006—That the Education Committee recommends that the draft Joint Inspections (Scotland) Regulations 2006 be approved. Supported by: Robert Brown
